title: Bharatpur Heritage Escape with All-Inclusive Dining & Two Kids Stay Free
description:
Wake to the sounds of nature at The Bagh, nestled amid 40 acres of 19th-century garden and bordering the famous Keoladeo National Park.

A heritage resort with the promise of luxury and nature just four hours from Delhi and three hours from Jaipur, this boutique resort, listed on Tripadvisor's Travellers' Choice awards 2021, is perfect for nature-seekers and avid birdwatchers. Garlanded by verdant gardens, lush organic farms, elegant architecture, and vast courtyards, The Bagh is a relaxing getaway from the hustle and bustle of city life. After a day spotting local birdlife, take a dip in the sparkling pool and then savour the array of dishes at Gulmohar, a multi-cuisine all-day diner, specialising in vegetarian food sourced from the region and the resort's organic farm.
offer_address: Old Agra, Achnera Rd, Bharatpur, Rajasthan 321001
